page.title: 07THORNBURY FESTIVALS / WINTER
page.content: {BONFIRE NIGHT} The Round Table Association organise the building of a large bonfire and hold a display of fireworks on Nov 5 at the Mundy Playing Field.There is also a smaller display held in the Chantry gardens. Janet Saunders (Aged 11 yrs) {MUMPING NIGHT} Mumping night is held on the Saturday before Christmas. It starts with a procession of people singing carols from the top of the High St to the Chantry. Once at the Chantry the people have a hot punch and mince pies before watching different entertainments such as recitals,puppet shows and mimes. Teddie Cowell (Aged 11 yrs){ {THORNBURY HUNT} The Hunt meets on Boxing day outside the White Lion.
